lines.text:
[commenting on Umbopa's abdominal tattoo]
I always thought that fellow had a drop of royal blood in him! You don't get a snake on your stomach for nothing, you know!
Well, you never know what you can do 'til you try.
While you're trying, your poor sister's peacefully passing away in Kilkenny.
Allan Quartermain, it was a lie about me father's sister.
I know. I've met the Irish before.
You know, O'Brien, there's only one kind of man that it's useless to argue with.
Then it is agreed we leave tonight?
It is not agreed - you must stay!
I'm in charge here! I told you that before!
That was in your country. You are now in mine!
I'm a man who looks for diamonds and hangs about your camp. That's what YOU said!
There's been a fortune in everything we've tried, but it wasn't us that found it...
